text: Thaddeus M. Buczko (February 23, 1926 â€“ March 7, 2021) was an American politician. He was a member of the Massachusetts House of Representatives from 1959 until 1964. He was Massachusetts Auditor from 1964 until 1981. Buczko died on March 7, 2021, in Salem, Massachusetts at age 95. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American judges Category:Lawyers from Massachusetts Category:Politicians from Massachusetts Category:Members of the Massachusetts General Court Category:People from Salem, Massachusetts Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Thaddeus M. Buczko
